title: Universal Android Debloater gets major debloat list update and a few new features
content:
After rolling out Universal Android Debloater v0.4.0 in February, XDA Member w1nst0n_fr has now released a fresh update for the shell script. The latest update (v0.5) brings a major debloat list update, a few new features, and several minor UI changes and improvements. For the unaware, Universal Android Debloater is a shell script that utilizes

The post Universal Android Debloater gets major debloat list update and a few new features appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest update for the Universal Android Debloater brings a major debloat list update, a few new features, and some UI changes.
